import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; const teamColor = { atl: '#E03A3E', bkn: '#000000', bos: '#007A33', cha: '#00788C', chi: '#CE1141', cle: '#860038', dal: '#00538C', den: '#0E2240', det: '#C8102E', gsw: '#1D428A', hou: '#CE1141', ind: '#002D62', lac: '#C8102E', lal: '#552583', mem: '#5D76A9', mia: '#98002E', mil: '#00471B', min: '#0C2340', nop: '#0C2340', nyk: '#006BB6', okc: '#007AC1', orl: '#0077C0', phi: '#006BB6', phx: '#1D1160', por: '#E03A3E', sac: '#5A2D81', sas: '#C4CED4', tor: '#CE1141', uta: '#002B5C', was: '#002B5C' } export default function PlayerProfile(props) { let cats = ['min', 'pts', 'reb', 'ast', 'stl', 'blk'] let statData = props.seasonStats[0] console.log(props.playerInfo) console.log(props) return (
{props.playerInfo[0].displayFirstLast}
{props.playerInfo[0].teamCity} {props.playerInfo[0].teamName}
Position: {props.playerInfo[0].position}
Jersey: {props.playerInfo[0].jersey}
{/*

Team: {props.playerInfo[0].teamCity} {props.playerInfo[0].teamName}

Position: {props.playerInfo[0].position}

Jersey: {props.playerInfo[0].jersey}

*/}

Current Season Stats

{cats.map((item) => ( <>
{props.seasonStats[0][item]}
{item.toUpperCase()}
))}
) }
